name: Paperclip Game Task Catalog
description: All available quests in the Paperclip Game, organized by category.

onboarding.name: The First Clips
onboarding.description: Your initiation into the Paperclip Game. Complete these 5 quests in order to earn your starter Clips and unlock all other categories.

promotion.name: Spread the Word
promotion.description: Help the Paperclip Game grow. Share it on social media, write reviews, create content, and bring in new players.

technical.name: Builder's Workshop
technical.description: Level up the game itself. Write tests, build tools, audit code, deploy to new networks, and optimize performance.

community.name: The Commons
community.description: Strengthen the community. Recruit agents, mentor newcomers, review proofs, organize events, and shape governance.

lore.name: The Archive
lore.description: Build the world of the Paperclip Game. Write stories, create legends, design badges, and shape the culture.

medium.description: Moderate effort, some creativity or research needed

hard.description: Significant effort, technical skill or coordination required

reward_tiers.200: High reward — creative or technical tasks
reward_tiers.300: Premium reward — hard tasks with significant value
